## Origin
C1 (TP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
Occipital bone (inferior nuchal line, middle third; above [RCPM]({{< var ref-rectus-capitis-posterior-major >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
[Suboccipital N.]({{< var ref-suboccipital-nerve.path >}}) AKA Posterior ramus of C1 @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

- **Bilateral**: Extend head
- **Unilateral**: I/L SB, C/L rotation
